name: Volumes Full in Week Based on Daily Use Rate
description: This PromQL query measures the rate at which storage volumes are expected to be full in a week based on the daily usage rate.
question: What is the projected volume usage rate for the upcoming week?

name: Running PVCs Above % Used Warning Threshold
description: This PromQL query measures the number of Persistent Volume Claims (PVCs) that are currently utilizing storage capacity above the defined warning threshold percentage.
question: How many Persistent Volume Claims are using storage capacity above the warning threshold?

description: This PromQL query measures the number of Persistent Volume Claims (PVCs) that are currently utilizing storage capacity above the defined warning threshold percentage.
question: Which PVCs have storage capacity utilization exceeding the warning threshold?

name: Unbound PVCs
description: This PromQL query measures the number of Unbound Persistent Volume Claims (PVCs) in the system.
question: How many Unbound PVCs are currently present?

name: Unbound PVCs
